abstract: Martin Carmody has rented out the former home of a Borders, rearranged some letters on the sign and opened his own low-budget bookstore.
snippet: Martin Carmody has rented out the former home of a Borders, rearranged some letters on the sign and opened his own low-budget bookstore.
lead_paragraph: The e-book and Amazon.com helped to undo Borders. But Martin Carmody is not deterred.

headline.main: An Ode to Cheap Books in a Former Borders
